results.name: MIND REFLECTION - Inside the Black Mirror Puzzle

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work. But no guarantee for a potato PC.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: More sounds equal more fun.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work. But no guarantee for a potato PC.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: We do advice to have a soundcard and at least 1 ear.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or better
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A soundcard is important to hear sounds and music.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Really... anything...
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A soundcard is recomended in order to hear sounds and music.

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Storage: 250 MB available space
